type.name: instance_property_assignment_select
type.description: The assignment of properties that define the experience instance.

type.description: The person, organization or person in an organization that gains the experience.

entity.name: Experience_gained
entity.description: An experience is gained by a person or organization.

explicit.description: The experience of a person or organization.

explicit.name: gained_by
explicit.description: The person, organization or person in organization that has the experience.

entity.name: Experience_instance
entity.description:
An instance of experience which contributes to the accumulation of knowledge or skill.
Changing the exhaust system on a car 2 years work on same type of milling machine 100 flying hours in a Tornado jetr 5 years as Workshop Manager
The nature, duration and worth of the experience instance can be described using assigned properties or by refering to activities or tasks.

explicit.name: consists_of
explicit.description: An experience instance can be described by, amonst other things, acting as a reource or taking part in an activity.

explicit.name: defines
explicit.description: An experience instace contributes to the definition of the experience gained.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text which characterizes the experience instance.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: The role in which the experience instance was performed. inspector manager mechanic

entity.name: Experience_type
entity.description:
A classification of exerience.
welding mechanical design flying

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the type of experience.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the type of experience is known.
